001001 00000 00001 0000000000000001     # addi $r0 $r1 1
001111 00001 00010 0000000000000001     # multi $r1 $r2 1
000000 00010 000000000000000000000      # asrt $2
00000000000000000000000000000001        # 1

001001 00000 00011 1111111111111111     # addi $r0 $r3 -1
001111 00011 00100 0000000000000001     # multi $r3 $r4 1
000000 00100 000000000000000000000      # asrt $4
11111111111111111111111111111111        # -1

001001 00000 00101 0000000000000011     # addi $r0 $r5 3
001111 00101 00110 0000000000000101     # multi $r5 $r6 5
000000 00110 000000000000000000000      # asrt $6
00000000000000000000000000001111        # 15

001001 00000 00101 0000000000000011     # addi $r0 $r5 3
001111 00101 00110 1111111111111011     # multi $r5 $r6 -5
000000 00110 000000000000000000000      # asrt $6
11111111111111111111111111110001        # -15

001001 00000 00111 0000000000001001     # addi $r0 $r7 9
001111 00111 01000 0000000000000100     # multi $r7 $r8 4
000000 01000 000000000000000000000      # asrt $8
00000000000000000000000000100100        # 36

001001 00000 00111 1111111111110111     # addi $r0 $r7 -9
001111 00111 01000 1111111111111100     # multi $r7 $r8 -4
000000 01000 000000000000000000000      # asrt $8
00000000000000000000000000100100        # 36

001001 00000 01001 0000000000000000     # addi $r0 $r9 0
001111 01001 01010 0000000000001011     # multi $r9 $r10 11
000000 01010 000000000000000000000      # asrt $10
00000000000000000000000000000000        # 0

001001 00000 01001 0000000000000000     # addi $r0 $r9 0
001111 01001 01010 1111111111110101     # multi $r9 $r10 -11
000000 01010 000000000000000000000      # asrt $10
00000000000000000000000000000000        # 0

000101 00000 00000 00000 00000 000000   # halt
